ack.p: The authors thank Dr. Kent Seeley, Director of the Center for Drug Discovery and Innovation (CDDI) Proteomics Core Facility at University of South Florida for the use of the mass spectrometers in this facility. We also thank Margaret Harvey for the cochleae dissections.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by NIH/NIDCD grant R01 DC004295 to BHAS.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets used and/or analyzed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.

sec.title: Authorâ€™s contributions
sec.p: LD and BS planned the experiments and wrote the manuscript. LD did the analyses and interpreted the results with BS. Both authors contributed to the research and read and approved the final version of the manuscript.
